flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction_rendered:
Relevant parts
  • Origami Paper
  • Cardstock - Card
  • Envelope
Tools
  • Rubber stamp
  • Stamp pad
  • Sticky Dots or Glue

lines.text: Here is what the finished product looks like.
lines.text_raw: Here is what the finished product looks like.

lines.text: Start with a piece of origami paper.
lines.text_raw: Start with a piece of origami paper.

lines.text: Turn it over with color side down.
lines.text_raw: Turn it over with color side down.

lines.text: Make a "+" fold and an "x" fold in the paper.
lines.text_raw: Make a "+" fold and an "x" fold in the paper.

lines.text: Now you are going to make point folds or airplane folds. (Picture 2)
lines.text_raw: Now you are going to make point folds or airplane folds. (Picture 2)

lines.text: Take note - you are only going to crease down part of the fold. Picture 3 is an unfolded view so you can see how far to crease.
lines.text_raw: Take note - you are only going to crease down part of the fold. Picture 3 is an unfolded view so you can see how far to crease.

lines.text: Continue doing this to all corners.
lines.text_raw: Continue doing this to all corners.

lines.text: Shown here are 2 pictures of what your paper should look like when finished folding.
lines.text_raw: Shown here are 2 pictures of what your paper should look like when finished folding.

lines.text: Let's start folding the star.
lines.text_raw: Let's start folding the star.

lines.text: Fold down each side as shown in picture 1
lines.text_raw: Fold down each side as shown in picture 1

lines.text: Go slowly. Continue folding sides down and center down as shown in picture 2.
lines.text_raw: Go slowly. Continue folding sides down and center down as shown in picture 2.

lines.text: Make sure your point lines up with the center line.
lines.text_raw: Make sure your point lines up with the center line.

lines.text: Fold down the point as in picture 3.
lines.text_raw: Fold down the point as in picture 3.

lines.text: Repeat the same process on the other side.
lines.text_raw: Repeat the same process on the other side.

lines.text: Fold back point.
lines.text_raw: Fold back point.

lines.text: Fold edge in as shown. Be careful to crease nicely at the edge. You want a nice point in the corner.
lines.text_raw: Fold edge in as shown. Be careful to crease nicely at the edge. You want a nice point in the corner.

lines.text: Repeat on both sides.
lines.text_raw: Repeat on both sides.

lines.text: Fold one of the sides over. (Picture 1)
lines.text_raw: Fold one of the sides over. (Picture 1)

lines.text: Fold down point. (Picture 2)
lines.text_raw: Fold down point. (Picture 2)

lines.text: Fold corners down as before. (Picture 3)
lines.text_raw: Fold corners down as before. (Picture 3)

lines.text: Do the same to the other side.
lines.text_raw: Do the same to the other side.

lines.text: The two sides you just did need to be glued down. You can either use glue or sticky dots.
lines.text_raw: The two sides you just did need to be glued down. You can either use glue or sticky dots.

lines.text: Make it into a greeting card!
lines.text_raw: Make it into a greeting card!

lines.text: Put some sticky dots or glue on the back. Stick it to a card.
lines.text_raw: Put some sticky dots or glue on the back. Stick it to a card.

lines.text: Use whatever greeting you'd like.
lines.text_raw: Use whatever greeting you'd like.

lines.text: Stamp it anywhere on your card.
lines.text_raw: Stamp it anywhere on your card.

lines.text: You've done it!
lines.text_raw: You've done it!

lines.text: You can even make a tiny star! Put it on the front of the envelope.
lines.text_raw: You can even make a tiny star! Put it on the front of the envelope.

guide.summary: Fold an origami star and make it into a wonderful greeting card.
guide.title: Origami Star & Greeting Card
